title: Thoughts on Syndra nerfs?
body:
Well, ranks 1,2 and 4 were all nerfed while ranked 3 and 5 were actually buffed. Which means that at level 9, her passive still brings her Q up to around about the same damage and the Rank 3 buff actually means when you hit level 6, you have a stronger Q than before but it's just not so dominant earlier than that.

I guess this just means you gotta play a little safer/more passively until you hit 6 and then you can just cheese all in like usual. (well you don't have to be more passive early but you won't be as much of a bully any more)

Is anyone else picking up any other massive changes that this will bring? I'm so sad they nerfed my Syndra :(

replies.body: Well... Yeah... I guess she was a little strong... But what about champs like Akali and Kat? When are they gonna get nerfed?
Finally her E isn't as wide as a %%%%ing bus anymore.
Well needed she was stupid asf

Thought on Syndra?

*Finally, she get's nerfed*

You can still all in at 6 pretty easily ;)
dw

I was just starting to pick up Syndra too. Literally bought her the other day.

But I guess I saw the nerfs coming. Her early damage/poke is huge. So easy to bully your opponent out of lane.
